titleStmt.title: These few lines are to all such as have an hand in persecuting the innocent people of God (called Quakers) for the exercise of their pure conscience towards God, whom Christ Jesus the Light hath redeemed ...
titleStmt.author: Smith, Mary, prisoner at Middlewich.

notesStmt.note: Title taken from first lines of text.
Place of publication conjectured by Wing; publication date from colophon.
"Here is another warning which was given forth some years before, .." has caption title on p. 6, and is signed and dated: Mary Smith. From the Ouse-bridge prison the 9. day of the 7. moneth 1659.
Reproduction of the original in the Friends House Library, London.
